text: Rocky Rapids is a hamlet in Brazeau County, Alberta, Canada. It has 300 people. ==Business== Rocky Rapids has one store. Most citizens work in Drayton Valley, Alberta. Drayton Valley is about 7 kilometers away. ==Education== Children go to school in Drayton Valley. Some may be home schooled. == References == *Brazeau County Category:Hamlets in Alberta
title: Rocky Rapids, Alberta
